CustomField.formula: IF( (OB_Archiver__Succeeded__c > 0 || OB_Archiver__Total_Skipped_Root_Records__c > 0 ||(ISPICKVAL(OB_Archiver__Type__c,"Index-request"))||(AND( ISPICKVAL(OB_Archiver__Type__c,"Unarchive"), OB_Archiver__RecordCount__c>0 )) || (AND( ISPICKVAL(OB_Archiver__Type__c,"Unarchive-sdk"), OB_Archiver__RecordCount__c>0 )) || (AND( ISPICKVAL(OB_Archiver__Type__c,"Unarchive-retry"), OB_Archiver__RecordCount__c>0 )) || (AND( ISPICKVAL(OB_Archiver__Type__c,"Export-and-download"), OB_Archiver__RecordCount__c>0 ))) && NOT(ISBLANK(OB_Archiver__EndedAt__c)) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( OB_Archiver__Type__c , "Estimate"))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL( OB_Archiver__Type__c , "Export-to-external-bucket")) ,IF(ISBLANK($CustomMetadata.01IWR0000022RFz.m2YWR000008f1V2.NamespacePrefix), HYPERLINK ("/apex/OwnBackup_LogsASCSVFileVF?requestId=" &OB_Archiver__RequestId__c &"&reportType=" &TEXT(OB_Archiver__Type__c) &"&logsType=" &"success" &"&policyId=" &OB_Archiver__PolicyId__r.Id &"&sobjectName=" & OB_Archiver__SObjectName__c ,"Download File"), HYPERLINK ("/apex/OB_Archiver__OwnBackup_LogsASCSVFileVF?requestId=" &OB_Archiver__RequestId__c &"&reportType=" &TEXT(OB_Archiver__Type__c) &"&logsType=" &"success" &"&policyId=" &OB_Archiver__PolicyId__r.Id &"&sobjectName=" & OB_Archiver__SObjectName__c,"Download File")), '')
CustomField.label: Execution Details
